name: Arcade Gannon
descriptions: Arcade Israel Gannon is a doctor and scientist with the Followers of the Apocalypse residing in the Mojave Wasteland in Fallout: New Vegas. He is a possible companion of the Courier.

The only son of Gannon Senior, an officer of the Enclave, and his wife, Arcade was born at the Navarro military base around 2246, a few years after the Chosen One blew up the oil rig. He lost his father at an early age, forming close ties with his mother, but in his own words, he never got over his passing.

Later, Arcade, his mother, and several of the troopers from his father's old unit were forced to abandon the Navarro base, narrowly evading the attack by the New California Republic that wiped it out. Even after escaping Navarro, they still remained in danger from being hunted down by the Brotherhood of Steel,
His time in the Followers helped Arcade find his calling in medicine. He learned everything he knows from the group at their excellent medical facilities in the NCR heartlands,
The NCR leadership eventually realized that remnants of the defeated Enclave had adopted new identities and lived in secret within their borders,

Following the remnants as far from the NCR as the Mojave Wasteland, Arcade settled in the New Vegas area where he integrated with Julie Farkas' chapter of the Followers residing at the Old Mormon Fort in Freeside. He chose to focus on botanical research at Julie's request, trying to come up with alternative treatments for common illnesses and injuries, and ways to produce medical supplies from local flora (eg. stimpaks from barrel cacti). While he considers the research noble, Arcade recognizes it as a waste of time due to the low probability of him actually making a breakthrough.
However, Arcade remains enthusiastic about helping people in general and the downtrodden and hopeless of Freeside specifically.
While Arcade claims he's boring

This same intellect also made him a man of firm convictions. He believes strongly in individual freedom, independence, and self-determination, to the point that if he is forced into servitude, he is willing to commit suicide by any means to escape bondage.

On a global level, he is a firm supporter of the independence of the Mojave from foreign powers or domestic autocrats. He believes that pushing the NCR and the Legion out of the Mojave and toppling Mr. House's autocratic rule would break the chains of the Mojave's denizens, allowing them to forge their own path. In such a case, he is ready to use his Enclave knowledge and technology to maintain order
The only problematic outcomes as far as Arcade's concerned are the autocrats. First, it's Mr. House and his power play, which brings with it disillusionment and breaking of ties with the Followers.
Due to personal conflict over his past, Arcade intentionally deflects personal questions, sometimes audaciously claiming it's specifically to obfuscate past associations with fascists.
The only long-lasting relationships Arcade maintains are with the Enclave remnants who he sees as family.
Despite the remnants' many reassurances, Arcade wishes he knew if he truly is like his father,
Arcade believes his decision to join the Followers was part of finding his own way, choosing a goal and direction of his own, working for something greater than just him.

Arcade will get fed up with the Courier if they do or say things that he dislikes. He has an internal counter of "dislike" points that are increased by doing or saying stupid or mean things or doing things that hurt the Followers. Once he has accumulated 3 "dislike" points, he will warn the Courier that they are "acting crazy." Most of these possible "dislike" points may be obtained during The White Wash quest. At 6 points, he will leave permanently. He also tracks "like" points, but those are only used to decide if he will start the For Auld Lang Syne quest early or not.

Arcade Gannon appears in Fallout: New Vegas and Fallout: Wasteland Warfare.
Arcade's voice actor, Zachary Levi, in the voiceover booth

Arcade's endings are intended to reflect that no one is damaged more by reality than the idealist. He does his best to be practical and rational, but there is a strong idealist streak in him/the Followers in general. In some of Arcade's "best" endings (meaning, the circumstances he thought he wanted), he is still somewhat disappointed by how things turned out. In his "worst" endings, he can wind up bitterly disillusioned, brutally murdered, crucified, casually executed and discarded in a ditch, or even defiantly suicidal.

Arcade is an idealist, so I did not think that he would do harm in his capacity as a doctor, nor would he refuse to provide medical aid even to a mortal enemy.  Yes, Arcade will follow you around and blast everything in the Mojave Wasteland with his plasma defender, but the circumstances of gameplay are different from when he’s put in the position of providing (or not) medical aid.

Arcade is not a pragmatic person, so in the circumstances where he becomes a long-term instrument of Caesar (post-endgame), he disembowels himself rather than living as a tool of evil (in his mind).  His suicide is intended to mirror the death of one of the most notable idealists of the Roman Republic, Cato the Younger.

It is certainly possible that he read other primary sources.  Based on Arcade’s education, it’s likely that the Followers of the Apocalypse had access to other Roman and Greek literature, including writings by Sallust and Lucan.

As Arcade and Caesar both know Latin, it is likely that the textbooks they used also contained snippets of Roman literature and quotes as sententiae antiquae (very common in Wheelock’s and many other books). Because the primary purpose of contemporary (i.e., 20th/21st century) Latin education is typically not conversation or writing, but comprehension of classic literature, the use of these quotes/references is common, though often without context.

topics.topic_text: ArcadeEDEEnclave
topics.response_text: Wow. That thing is definitely carrying around a bunch of Enclave intel. Adams is on the eastern seaboard of the country.

topics.topic_text: ArcadeEDENoEnclave
topics.response_text: I don't want to be... alarmist or anything, but maybe you should ditch that Eyebot.{catching himself}Robot. Whatever that thing is.

topics.topic_text: ArcadeEDEOpinion
topics.response_text: I don't know if you care about my opinion, but I'd prefer that you turn ED-E over to the Followers. Surprised, right?

topics.topic_text: FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
topics.response_text: Easy as a heart transplant.

topics.topic_text: It's time for us to part ways.
topics.response_text: {joking}I thought my charm could win you over, but I guess it wasn't meant to be. Are you sure you want me to go?

topics.topic_text: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
topics.response_text: {"Thought so."}Mmm hm.

topics.topic_text: Yes, I'm sure.
topics.response_text: I'll head back to the Old Mormon Fort. If you need me, just swing by.

topics.topic_text: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
topics.response_text: {sighing}Back to the tomb, I suppose. If you need me, et cetera.

topics.topic_text: I think we should travel together.
topics.response_text: You have quite the menagerie at your disposal. If you can get the posse down to "small gang" size, I'll happily go with you.

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Lead the way.

topics.topic_text: FollowersOverburdened
topics.response_text: {a little annoyed}I'm not exactly in Power Armor over here, so why don't you help lighten my load a bit?

topics.topic_text: FollowersStealthing
topics.response_text: {hushed, not confident in his abilities}O... kay. I'll do my best.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: I'll defer to your judgment, naturally.

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: {worried}I'll do my best.

topics.topic_text: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
topics.response_text: Understood. I won't hesitate.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Not a problem.

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: After you.

topics.topic_text: Switch to a melee weapon.
topics.response_text: If you would like me to die very rapidly, this is clearly the best tactical choice.

topics.topic_text: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
topics.response_text: I'm hardly a whirlwind of death when left to my own devices, but all right.

topics.topic_text: I want you to use ranged weapons.
topics.response_text: {sounds great to him}No arguments from me.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: Just tell me where you want me.

topics.topic_text: Stay close to me.
topics.response_text: I'm not going to wander off, but okay.

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay.

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: Got it.

topics.topic_text: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
topics.response_text: Wherever you want me. No problem.

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: Let me know if you need anything else.

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: Sure. Just don't treat me like a pack Brahmin, okay?

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: I'll be here. Just don't expect me to fend off a gang of Super Mutants while you're gone.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Like I said, I needed to go do something. This is it. It belonged to my father.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
topics.response_text: {irritated that the player is shooting near him}Stop doing that, please.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: {player is aiming gun at Arcade}I assure you, you look extremely virile. Now, would you mind pointing that somewhere else? Thanks.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: {player is dropping mines near Arcade}Can't wait to see where this is going.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: {he just threw a grenade}Look out!

topics.topic_text: What kind of research?
topics.response_text: Oh, you know. Finding alternative treatments for common illnesses and injuries. Stimpaks out of barrel cacti and other fantastic improbabilities.

topics.topic_text: Why do you do research instead of providing medical assistance?
topics.response_text: Not all Followers are "people persons." Besides, someone needs to do research. I have no problem with Julie sticking me back here.

topics.topic_text: You don't sound too enthusiastic about it.
topics.response_text: I'm enthusiastic about helping people, but{nih-hill noh-wee soob soh-lay}nihil novi sub sole.

topics.topic_text: What's the goal?
topics.response_text: For the past hundred years or so, the Followers have managed to get by using salvaged medical supplies from the Old World.

topics.topic_text: What kinds of illnesses and injuries?
topics.response_text: Cuts, lacerations, broken bones. Infections resulting from all of the above. Common cold, influenza. Take your pick.

topics.topic_text: Isn't that the language that Caesar's Legion speaks?
topics.response_text: {“Yeah, well...”}{SEE-zar}Caesar can cite{KAY-toe}Cato to suit his purpose. Many people have spoken Latin. Some of them were quite pleasant.

topics.topic_text: Nihi-what?
topics.response_text: Oh.{sincere}Sorry. "There is nothing new under the sun."

topics.topic_text: Where did you learn that?
topics.response_text: Not from the Legion, if that's what you're getting at. Books. Sheet music. Gladiator movie holotapes. Bits and pieces here and there.

topics.topic_text: Do you know much about Caesar?
topics.response_text: {sighs}I don't know anything that the others couldn't tell you. Caesar was one of the Followers. Before my time, of course.

topics.topic_text: Why don't you come with me?
topics.response_text: I can't leave now. Caesar has gained too much ground. I need to be here in case the NCR fails to hold Hoover Dam.

topics.topic_text: Do the Followers use a lot of energy weapons?
topics.response_text: {off-hand, not realizing he's revealing something bad}Energy weapons? Of course not.

topics.topic_text: Memories of what?
topics.response_text: Oh, uh...{trying to cover}of hearing stories. About energy weapons.{drifting off}They're... pretty crazy.{quietly}Yeah.

topics.topic_text: If you say so.
topics.response_text: Did I say something? Sorry. Don't pay any attention to me. Just babbling.{becoming more quiet}Nonsense, really.{drifting off}Babbling nonsense.

topics.topic_text: I just want to hear Caesar out.
topics.response_text: Very optimistic of you. You'll make a good Follower someday assuming Caesar doesn't have us both crucified.

topics.topic_text: Let's just listen to him, figure out what he's up to, and get out.
topics.response_text: Short of canceling our imminent travel plans, that's the best thing you could have said.

topics.topic_text: Once we get close to Caesar, we can strike.
topics.response_text: {"And you, my friend?" eht too mee ah-mee-kay?}Et tu, mi amice?

topics.topic_text: I'm not going to let Benny get away.
topics.response_text: I can't say I understand your obsession, but for that I suppose I'd have to spend a night in your grave.

topics.topic_text: I'm going after a man named Benny for revenge and I need someone to keep me patched up.
topics.response_text: Pulling bullets out of a vengeance-crazed drifter is truly a noble step up from tending to the downtrodden of Freeside, but I think I'll pass.

topics.topic_text: The NCR needs help against the Legion before Caesar moves on the dam. We could use your skills.
topics.response_text: The NCR had a chance to use the Followers' skills before, but being imperialists mattered more to them. No thanks.

topics.topic_text: I'm trying to help Mr. House keep New Vegas independent.
topics.response_text: That's funny. Mr. House doesn't want to keep New Vegas independent. He just wants to keep the NCR and Caesar's Legion from pushing him around.

topics.topic_text: If New Vegas can remain independent, I'm going to find a way to do it. I could use your help.
topics.response_text: If that's really what you're trying to do, I'll go with you.

topics.topic_text: The NCR oppression around here would disappear if the Legion took control. I could use your help.
topics.response_text: Only because everyone would be conscripted or enslaved. And the people who are unfit for military service or slavery would be put down. Swell plan.

topics.topic_text: Things are bad around here. I'd like to make a difference, and I'd like you to help me.
topics.response_text: Hmm. That seems appropriately resolute and yet vague. I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and go with you, but let me be clear about something.

topics.topic_text: This place is really complicated and stuff. You're smart. Can you help me do... things?
topics.response_text: Hmm. Wow. You sound like you really do need some help. Look, I can help you out, but you can't do anything stu-

topics.topic_text: Ugh. Well if you're going to be like that then never mind.
topics.response_text: Yes. The Followers do not like Caesar or Caesar's Legion. You should also not like them. If you do, you like hurting people and that is bad. Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: Uh... it beats sitting around here all day, doesn't it?
topics.response_text: {slight mockery}Uh... probably not. Until things settle down around here, alleviating my boredom isn't a good motive to leave. Sorry.

topics.topic_text: Fair enough.
topics.response_text: All right. Let's not waste any time.{a bit of enthusiasm}There are people out there to help, things to learn. Maybe not in that order, but let's get to it.

topics.topic_text: Oh, well... in that case, never mind.
topics.response_text: I'm not sure why you thought a Follower would want to help Caesar after all of the misery he's visited on us and the people we try to help.

topics.topic_text: I need a good-looking doctor to help take care of me in the big, bad wasteland.
topics.response_text: Overt flirtation will get you everywhere, you know.

topics.topic_text: What kind of prototypes?
topics.response_text: Plasma rifles. They were intended to replace the P94 plasma caster.

topics.topic_text: An odd combination.
topics.response_text: REPCONN went through some rough times. When their rocket business was shaky, Mr. House purchased the company.

topics.topic_text: What was Project SEMELE?
topics.response_text: Another one of Poseidon Energy's many secret weapons projects. Before the Great War. It didn't go anywhere.

topics.topic_text: Do you need any help?
topics.response_text: Me, specifically? No. I'm sure Julie Farkas does, though. Lab coat, pointy hair. Answers to the name "Julie Farkas," strangely enough.

topics.topic_text: Would you like to come with me? I could use someone skilled in medicine.
topics.response_text: Hmm... I'm starting to remember hearing some rumors about you and this crazy guy called "Caesar." Bad. Not a friend of the Followers.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: See you around.

topics.topic_text: Right. "The Followers don't endorse his actions," and all that.
topics.response_text: Well{emph}I don't. I'm sure there were a few people turning a blind eye, but can you blame them?

topics.topic_text: If you say so. I'm not arguing.
topics.response_text: I do say so. The Followers aren't a military organization. If anyone knew what he was up to, they weren't talking.

topics.topic_text: Let's keep moving.
topics.response_text: Of course.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry. I didn't realize it would end like this.
topics.response_text: {sighing, pause}Neither did Anderson.

topics.topic_text: What's done is done.
topics.response_text: {irritated}I guess that means you don't have to apologize to all of the people in Westside you just screwed over.

topics.topic_text: Anderson killed White. He deserved to pay for what he did.
topics.response_text: Fantastic. Now the only influential person who gave a damn about Westside is gone. Great job.

topics.topic_text: When was that?
topics.response_text: Huh.{trying to think of a plausible lie}Good question. Must have been in a book.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about them?
topics.response_text: Uh, what does anyone know about them? Big... flying machines, right? Crazy helicopters.{quietly}So weird.

topics.topic_text: Hmm, on second thought...
topics.response_text: Look, the Followers have had enough of a role in the misery that this area has had to endure.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Certainly.

topics.topic_text: Would you reconsider my offer to travel with me? I could really use your help.
topics.response_text: The last time we discussed this, you didn't exactly wow me with your pitch. What have you got for me this time?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about yourself.
topics.response_text: I'm really very boring. You'd get better stories out of a Freeside junkie.

topics.topic_text: What's your opinion on the current situation?
topics.response_text: You're helping the Legion, a slaving army that will almost certainly kill and enslave the majority of people in New Vegas.

topics.topic_text: They profit from crime, now I profit, too.
topics.response_text: {sickened}That's one way to look at it.

topics.topic_text: I need you to leave.
topics.response_text: {joking}I thought my charm could win you over, but I guess it wasn't meant to be. Are you sure you want me to go?

topics.topic_text: I'd like you to come with me.
topics.response_text: You have quite the menagerie at your disposal. If you can get the posse down to "small gang" size, I'll happily go with you.

topics.topic_text: What's your problem with ED-E?
topics.response_text: It just seems a little twitchy. Some of these robots, you look at them the wrong way, don't screw in a vacuum tube right...

topics.topic_text: Ooooo-kay.
topics.response_text: Fine, ignore me. Just don't ask me to re-attach your arm when your pet murder machine goes into "search and destroy" mode.

topics.topic_text: What's an eee-em-pee?
topics.response_text: It's...{sigh}a thing. A science thing. It hurts robots. Don't worry about it. Silly Arcade's just telling magnetic field jokes for his own amusement.

topics.topic_text: That sounds a little paranoid, Arcade.
topics.response_text: Does it?{beat, quietly}Does it?

topics.topic_text: I'll keep an eye on it.
topics.response_text: Safety first. That's all I'm saying.

topics.topic_text: Do you always deflect personal questions?
topics.response_text: Only to obfuscate my past association with a fascist paramilitary organization.

topics.topic_text: How did you join the Followers?
topics.response_text: Honestly, it isn't too difficult if you have half a brain and aren't a complete jerk. I wanted to help people and I enjoyed learning, so I signed up.

topics.topic_text: Where did you get your medical training?
topics.response_text: The Followers taught me everything I know about medicine. Despite our humble abode here in New Vegas, we have great facilities back in the NCR.

topics.topic_text: If you don't like it, leave.
topics.response_text: Don't mind if I do. Enjoy your reign as King Scumbag the First, Overlord of Westside.

topics.topic_text: Sure.
topics.response_text: Any day now, Caesar's going to try to march across Hoover Dam and kick NCR out of the Mojave.

topics.topic_text: Not right now, Arcade.
topics.response_text: {drawing the word out}Actually, I'm going to keep talking anyway. Sorry, but I really need to get this out.

topics.topic_text: Good thing there are still people like you around.
topics.response_text: Kind of you to say, but there are better people than me around here. I just hope the Followers can make a difference in the long run.

topics.topic_text: What are you talking about?
topics.response_text: I wasn't always with the Followers, or with the NCR.

topics.topic_text: Arcade, I'm not interested.
topics.response_text: Are you sure? I didn't even get to the ostensibly "good" part.

topics.topic_text: I'm sure. I'm not interested.
topics.response_text: Okay, I hear you. Forget I said anything. Consider it dropped.

topics.topic_text: Where did the Enclave go?
topics.response_text: A lot of different places. I only know what I was told. Some of them were cut down by the NCR and the Brotherhood. Some of them went east.

topics.topic_text: What happened to Navarro?
topics.response_text: After the Enclave's command structure fell apart, it was only a matter of time before Navarro was overrun by NCR forces.

topics.topic_text: Where are you going with all this?
topics.response_text: The Enclave did a lot of bad things, but there were good people at Navarro. Good people with a lot of experience.

topics.topic_text: Do you want them to help NCR?
topics.response_text: That's a hard question to answer. I know I don't want the Legion to take Hoover Dam.

topics.topic_text: Say no more. I'll do it.
topics.response_text: Great!{excited}I'd like you to talk to the old-timers, the Remnants. I don't think I can convince them by myself. To them, I'm still a kid.

topics.topic_text: I'm not interested.
topics.response_text: {surprised}Oh.{beat}After spilling my guts to you, I wasn't expecting that kind of a response but... I understand.

topics.topic_text: How do you know so much about this, again?
topics.response_text: Stop thinking so much. Thanks.

topics.topic_text: I'm sure he means well.
topics.response_text: It isn't enough to mean well if you don't do good. I'm sure Caesar meant well, too.

topics.topic_text: But in the end, doesn't it all just come down to numbers anyway?
topics.response_text: If you lose your humanity, then I suppose that is all that's left.

topics.topic_text: I thought you were interested in preserving life.
topics.response_text: I know I shouldn't place one life below another, but in Caesar's case, I'll make an exception.

topics.topic_text: The world needs Caesar more than it needs you.
topics.response_text: {"The conquering cause pleased the gods, but the conquered cause pleased Cato" - week-treex cow-sah deh-ees plah-coo-eet sehd week-tah cah-toh-nee}Victrix causa deis placuit sed victa Catoni.

topics.topic_text: Enjoying your stay?
topics.response_text: In the words of Socrates, "Go fornicate yourself."

topics.topic_text: With how messed up New Vegas is, do you really think Caesar has nothing to offer?
topics.response_text: At least the mess is ours to clean up.

topics.topic_text: I'm just trying to be open-minded.
topics.response_text: It's a good thing to be, but you may want to close the floodgates once you see how Caesar runs things.

topics.topic_text: Yes, that's exactly what I'm suggesting.
topics.response_text: Okay. I just wanted you to confirm that I'm traveling in the company of an insane fascist. Thanks.

topics.topic_text: NCR is broken beyond repair. Its time has come.
topics.response_text: If the NCR is broken, it will fail on its own.

topics.topic_text: The Legion is better than the alternative.
topics.response_text: What?! Caesar is going to enslave or kill everyone in the Mojave.

topics.topic_text: Actually, yes, I would like to see New Vegas turned into a slavery hub.
topics.response_text: Great! You're either unimaginably cruel or profoundly insane!

topics.topic_text: More than collateral damage. A necessary sacrifice.
topics.response_text: How noble of you.

topics.topic_text: That's a good way to put it.
topics.response_text: Sure, if you're a sociopath.

topics.topic_text: They hide behind NCR's protection and they deserve everything coming to them.
topics.response_text: They sure don't, but I hope you get everything that's coming to you.

topics.topic_text: Sorry. I just lose my head sometimes.
topics.response_text: If by "sometimes" you mean "a lot of times," I agree. Please, just... settle down, okay?

topics.topic_text: Whatever.
topics.response_text: That wasn't exactly the response I was hoping for, but I'll give you the benefit of the doubt.

topics.topic_text: If you have a problem with me, why don't you just leave right now?
topics.response_text: If you insist. Have a nice life.

topics.topic_text: Why?
topics.response_text: Because you're helping Caesar's Legion. They are bad. You are bad. I am going. Bye.

topics.topic_text: Fine. Get lost.
topics.response_text: That was the plan. Bye.

topics.topic_text: Don't be too hard on him. It's part of who he is.
topics.response_text: I suppose you're right. When you're part of something for that long, maybe it's impossible to let go without losing part of yourself.

topics.topic_text: A man should know when to let go.
topics.response_text: It's been decades, you know. By now, he's been out of the Enclave longer than he was in.

topics.topic_text: It was an important part of her life. Why shouldn't she enjoy it?
topics.response_text: As screwed up as it sounds, at least she was part of something. Granted, it was something... admittedly, pretty bad, but it was something.

topics.topic_text: Some people can't stop reliving their glory days.
topics.response_text: Not much glory in the Enclave. Most of her old comrades are long gone.

topics.topic_text: I'm sure your father would be proud of you.
topics.response_text: I wonder if he would. It's pointless, I know, but sometimes I wonder what he wanted me to be.

topics.topic_text: Why worry about it? You don't have to be your father.
topics.response_text: I grew up without him. I'll always feel like something is missing from my life. But you're right.

topics.topic_text: His work was what mattered to him.
topics.response_text: Not everyone dreams of being a revolutionary, I suppose. Maybe we can't all change the world.

topics.topic_text: It seems pointless to do all of that without a goal.
topics.response_text: I'm sure Henry has goals. He was just more concerned with the "how" than the "why" of things. Being in the Enclave didn't really mean much to him.

topics.topic_text: They're loyal to you, too.
topics.response_text: Sometimes I wonder how much of my father they see in me. They went through a lot together, but my family went through it, too.

topics.topic_text: That's their story Arcade, not yours.
topics.response_text: Oh, I know. I was only a boy when they went through hell together. I'm glad you're helping me reunite them.

topics.topic_text: You've certainly done your part.
topics.response_text: I've been wondering about Daisy and the others for so long, I still haven't figured out what I should do.

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Hold on a second. I need to talk to you about something else.

topics.topic_text: You're assuming a motive without evidence. Please be rational.
topics.response_text: Fine. Would you mind explaining{emph}why you killed Anderson?

topics.topic_text: It's cleaner this way, without bringing NCR in. No connecting Anderson back to the locals.
topics.response_text: That's a grim deal to make. But when it came down to it, it's the same choice he made. Not all sacrifices are made by the willing.

topics.topic_text: It was either this or spend the rest of his life in an NCR chain gang.
topics.response_text: That was his decision to make, not yours.

topics.topic_text: Allowing Anderson to get away with murder tells him and everyone else that it's permissable.
topics.response_text: There are other ways to punish people, other ways to condemn their actions.

topics.topic_text: What will you do if Caesar wins?
topics.response_text: {melancholy}What the Followers always do. Whatever we can.

topics.topic_text: You can do better than that.
topics.response_text: No, really. Have you ever snorted a ground up Cazador venom sac? Neither have I, but I can guarantee you that a Freeside junkie{emph.}has.

topics.topic_text: Arcade, I'm asking you because I'm interested. Don't put yourself down.
topics.response_text: Oh, all right. I'm thirty-ish.{admitting}Well, late thirties. I was born...{guarded}west of here. I was an only child and spent most of my time with my mother.

topics.topic_text: Why don't you like talking about yourself?
topics.response_text: Some people do. I just... don't.

topics.topic_text: I'll say.
topics.response_text: Okay, okay, you don't have to agree with me{emph}that much.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: {sounds reasonable}All right.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: All right.

topics.topic_text: Of course.
topics.response_text: Great. Glad we're on the same page.

topics.topic_text: Why not to the whole area equally?
topics.response_text: NCR troops control Hoover Dam. Why do they need{emph}more power?

topics.topic_text: Noted.
topics.response_text: {nervous}O... kay.

topics.topic_text: Redundancy. If Caesar takes the dam and cuts off power, it will be chaos all over New Vegas.
topics.response_text: Hmm. That's a valid point. I'm not really behind the NCR in all of this, but the last thing I want is panic in the streets.

topics.topic_text: You can always use more power, right?
topics.response_text: Maybe if you're Mr. House you do. I bet the people in Freeside need it a lot more than he does.

topics.topic_text: Er...
topics.response_text: Yeah, exactly. They don't.

topics.topic_text: Oh, uh... whoops, I thought that was to turn it off.
topics.response_text: Argh, you moron! You're going to kill all of the troopers down there!

topics.topic_text: I'm thinking I'm going to get a sweet Pre-War laser. What are you thinking?
topics.response_text: I'm thinking that I'm leaving because you are a sociopath. Good riddance.

topics.topic_text: Time for the NCR to roast.
topics.response_text: Oh, to hell with this!

topics.topic_text: If you're so sure it's going to be a bloodbath, maybe you should stay in Freeside.
topics.response_text: I figured you'd say that. Sometimes staying put is the best thing you can do.

topics.topic_text: What happens in Freeside won't make any difference if the Legion takes the dam. Fight with them.
topics.response_text: Good point. You've been encouraging the others to stand up and fight, maybe I should take the same advice. After all, I also lived in Navarro.

topics.topic_text: You were born at Navarro, but you are your own man. They have their fight, and you have yours.
topics.response_text: True enough, I suppose. Getting them back together must be worth more than me spraying plasma all over the dam.

topics.topic_text: Well you... you're different.
topics.response_text: I am, but they're still my family. I think you were right the first time. If there's something I can do to help hold the dam, I'll do it.

topics.topic_text: You aren't like the others, Arcade. You're still young. It's up to you to decide who you want to be.
topics.response_text: True enough. Maybe I can't fill my father's shoes. I wouldn't even know how.

topics.topic_text: That was just talk. It's not the same for you.
topics.response_text: No, I think it{emph.}is the same for me. Maybe for a different reason, but... you can't hold on to a past you've never had.

topics.topic_text: I'm honored.
topics.response_text: It's the least I could do. All I ask is that you put it to good use. This place has lived in the shadow of Caesar for long enough.

topics.topic_text: Who, Caesar?
topics.response_text: Of course, Caesar! You can hardly even hold his men responsible, given how they're practically raised to worship him as a living deity.

topics.topic_text: He seemed pretty smart to me.
topics.response_text: Being "smart" doesn't matter if you're insane. Everything makes sense to Caesar because he's twisted everything to his world view.

topics.topic_text: He's a madman. What did you expect?
topics.response_text: Well, yeah! Right. What{emph}did I expect? The man's a megalomaniac. He acts like this is some pre-ordained cycle we're returning to.

topics.topic_text: I don't think either of us can fully understand what he and the tribes have gone through.
topics.response_text: A fair point, but from the perspective of someone on the east side of Arizona, the man is clearly out of his mind.

topics.topic_text: What do you think the others will do at Hoover Dam?
topics.response_text: I don't think you need to worry about the specifics. Basically, expect a lot of firepower and dead bodies.

topics.topic_text: Thanks, I guess.
topics.response_text: {disappointed}I have to admit, I did not expect that sort of response.

topics.topic_text: What are you going to do now?
topics.response_text: Back to Old Mormon Fort, where I can do some good. We Followers may be idealistic but even I know this is going to end in blood.

topics.topic_text: Is the Enclave's treatment by the Brotherhood influencing your opinion?
topics.response_text: Some of the old-timers like Moreno hold grudges against the Brotherhood and the NCR. I'd like to think I'm above that, but you may be right.

topics.topic_text: Why not the Brotherhood?
topics.response_text: The Brotherhood hoards knowledge and is obviously a smidge more violent than the Followers.

topics.topic_text: Understood.
topics.response_text: {a little concerned}Okay. Don't have to make a decision now. Just... sleep on it or something.

topics.topic_text: Don't worry. I agree.
topics.response_text: Great. Then all is right with the world.

topics.topic_text: What do you think I should do about ED-E? Brotherhood or Followers?
topics.response_text: This shouldn't be too surprising, but I'd prefer you let the Followers examine him.{unsure}Hopefully the reasons are obvious.

topics.topic_text: VEndingArcade
topics.response_text: {Narration}Though Arcade's intentions were pure and his goals were noble, he ultimately succumbed to the harsh brutality of the Mojave like so many before him.

combat.response_text: {irritated at being attacked}Temporary insanity?{I'll buy it}All right.
I don't have much protection here. Mind helping me out?
{irritated, angry, confused}What the hell are you doing?
{crippled limbs}I could use a Doctor's Bag if you have any handy.
{grimly: eht een ahr-kay-dee-ah eh-goh, "I too was an Arcadian."}Et in Arcadia ego.
{suspicious}You're not really supposed to be here.
{Dying}Ugh. Maybe I should have stayed back in NCR after all.
{a little concerned}Hmm. Might need some antidote here.
{feeling better, joking}Will the medical wonders of the post-apocalyptic world never cease?
{sighs}It is my medical opinion that that could have gone better.
{worried}Might be time for a weapon upgrade.
